author: Wowern, Johann van der, 1574-1612
title: Joan. A Wower De polymathia tractatio: integri operis de studiis veterum apospasmátion ... accesserunt prætereà autoris vita & elogia: In polymathiam item tabellæ synopticæ, cum indice rerum ac verborum
imprint: "Lipsiæ: sumptibus Laurentii Sigismundi Corneri Bibliop., Literis Christiani Michaelis, 1665"
